name: Punch Jump
description:
Punch Jump is a Foddian Platformer, which means progress is difficult and not guaranteed.

The central mechanic is throwing around Carl, who is an NPC

The goal of the game is to get him to the end of the level.

The art-style is minimalist and the in-game radio system plays a large variety of music from royalty-free authors.

The platforms and particles in the game flash to the beat of the music currently playing.

If you are confident in your skills at platforming type games, then this game will humble you.


Join our Discord!
